context: Airbnb, Inc. is a online marketplace for short-term lodging and experiences focused on vacation rentals, unique stays, and travel experiences. Valued at $25.5B. Expanding globally despite regulatory battles with cities over housing impacts.

competitors.name: HomeAway/VRBO
competitors.notes: Vacation rental platform focused on whole-home rentals, owned by Expedia

competitors.name: Booking.com
competitors.notes: Online travel agency adding vacation rental inventory

competitors.name: Hotels
competitors.notes: Traditional hotel industry including Marriott, Hilton, Hyatt being disrupted

competitors.name: FlipKey (TripAdvisor)
competitors.notes: Vacation rental platform owned by TripAdvisor

competitors.name: Wimdu
competitors.notes: European short-term rental competitor (later shut down)
